content: liam s bunny hat v 1 2 a crochet replica of the hat worn by liam adrian cornejo ramos a five-year-old taken by ice on january 21 2026 pattern by esther brownsmith updated on 1/28/26 if you notice anything incorrect or unclear please email me disclaimer i put together this pattern myself as i could not find one online the pattern is free and can be used and adapted by anyone as long as you don t resell the pattern for profit if you are able please consider sending $5 to help affected families in minnesota such as through the immigrant law center of minnesota skill level easy intermediate you will need to know chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet back loop only blo slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch back loop only blo single_crochet increase increase single_crochet decrease decrease turning working in a spiral amigurumi-style and sewing together pieces uses us terminology materials 5 or 5 5mm crochet hook i have a big head so i used 5 5 5 would be good for most 215 yards bright blue worsted yarn i used premier basix blue 105 yards white worsted yarn i used premier basix cream a few yards of black worsted yarn instructions hat make 1 in blue to the size of your head 1 chain 46 or the length from the crown of your head to your eyebrows plus another couple of inches for the folded brim turn 2 slip_stitch 5 then half_double_crochet for the remainder of the chain chain 1 turn 3 half_double_crochet blo until the final five slip stitches then slip_stitch blo 5 chain 1 turn 4 slip_stitch blo 5 then half_double_crochet blo the rest of the way chain 1 turn repeat steps 3 and 4 until you have the circumference that fits your head when stretched just slightly for me this was 18 repetitions finish with step 4 then slip_stitch blo held together with the original chain to make a cylinder finish off at the narrow end leaving a foot of tail and thread the yarn tail around the small edge then pull tight to cinch shut the top of the hat knot and weave in ends bunny ears make 2 in white 1 chain 2 in the first chain single_crochet 6 do not join crochet in a spiral 6 stitches 2 increase 6 12
